text: The journey may have only just begun, but the Truthsayers demand results. To aid you, the High Druid sends word of warriors ready to join the Ravenqueen Host.\\n\\nThe four main clans of Albion each has warriors ready – choose which clan to honour.

The Overking's and Petty Chieftain's of Albion are mightily impressed by your deeds against Chaos hordes. They are therefore offering great warriors to swell the ranks of the Ravenqueen Host.\\n\\nThe four main clans of Albion each has warriors ready – choose which clan to honour.

With your remarkable progress in the war against Chaos the Shadows are lifting. The Truthsayer Council now ensures that only the most veteran warriors are sent to bolster the Ravenqueen Host.\\n\\nThe four main clans of Albion each has warriors ready – choose which clan to honour.
